item.title: GPT-5: Key characteristics, pricing and system card
item.description: GPT-5 introduces a hybrid architecture, blending a fast, general model with a deeper reasoning model and a real-time router, improving task competence with token input limits of 272K and 128K output tokens. Pricing is highly competitive: $1.25/million input and $10/million output tokens, with significant caching discounts. It emphasizes safety through safe-completions, reducing hallucinations, and mitigating sycophancy via post-training. Prompt injection resilience remains imperfect, with over 50% attack success at multiple queries. API features include reasoning traces and efficient streaming via reasoning_effort=minimal. Practical tools demonstrated include SVG generation and reasoning via API, highlighting its capability for complex, creative tasks.
